Title: The new generation grows up in happiness
Publisher: Huadong renmin meishu chubanshe (华东人民美术出版社), Shanghai
Notes: Photographs showing the improved conditions for Chinese youngsters growing up after Liberation. The series focusses on Shanghai. Here showing children meeting foreign visitors (delegates to the Asia and Pacific Region Peace Conference); talking with a labor model; meeting with actors; and visiting Moscow.
Theme: Early Campaigns (1949-1954)Models and MartyrsForeign FriendsForeign Friends: Soviet Union
Tags: Asia and Pacific Region Peace Conference
